#Blockchain: Transactionfee goes to miner. Only a certain amount of TXS being processed in a certain timeframe. Priority goes to TXS with higher fees. #IOTA: All users are validators. No mining necessary, means no fees, eco! #crypto #cryptocurrency #bitcoin #btc #DLT  https://t.co/Zudg3EKzGa
